name: Customer Name
title: CUST
definition: Identifies the name of the customer who originated this request when that customer will only have a limited amount of exchange access and has not been assigned a CCNA (Customer Carrier Name Abbreviation).
usageNotes: Required when the CCNA field is “CUS”, otherwise optional.
fieldNotes: The initiator of this request will be contacted to supply customer location information and technical specifications.
